description:
dark stained fruitwood, relief carving of foliate and scrolling; octagonal barrel and breech; gilt brass wheelcover and figures placed throughout; images of St. George and the Dragon at trigger; brass nail heads incorporated throughout carved woodwork design. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
markings: \'Martin Gummi in Culmbach 1650\' and his mark engraved at top of breech
title: Wheel lock hunting rifle
